animals.name: Decorative animals
animals.description: Rabbits, guinea pigs, hamsters, chinchillas, birds

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: "Palyan" Limited Liability Company (LLC) specializes in the wholesale import and sale of veterinary vaccines and drugs, offering high-quality and safe products approved by global manufacturers, as we are convinced that animal health begins with the right medication. We import only those veterinary drugs that have passed international quality standards and are approved by experienced specialists. We collaborate with veterinary clinics, farms, and veterinary specialists, providing effective solutions in line with market demands.

services.subtitle: THE BEST FOR ANIMALS
services.description: With certified products, we support effective animal care and a healthy lifestyle, providing professionals with reliable supply and long-term cooperation.

services.subtitle: PROFESSIONAL APPROACH
services.description: We operate with professional responsibility, relying on science and best practices, offering partners tailored solutions, clear terms, and reliable cooperation.

benefits.title: Our main advantages are
benefits.description: We cooperate with veterinary clinics, farmers, veterinary specialists, and processing plants, providing effective solutions in line with market requirements.

benefits.title: Large assortment
benefits.description: A wide selection of veterinary drugs in demand and certified on the market

target.title: What is the company's target?
target.description: The main objectives of  Palyan LLC are multifaceted, with its core mission being the protection and maintenance of animal health. The company aims to import and supply high-quality, safe, and effective veterinary medicines, vaccines, and animal care products, ensuring the health and well-being of both farm animals and pets.

footer.description: The company was founded in 2025, and its employees have many years of experience and expertise in this field.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subject: Subject
contact.successText: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorConfig: Email service is not configured. Please contact support for assistance.
contact.additionalInfo: You can also reach us directly using the contact information above. We typically respond within 24 hours.
contact.checkoutSuccess: Order sent successfully! Check your email for confirmation.
contact.checkoutError: Failed to send order. Please try again.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions
faq.contactTitle: Didn't find the answer to your question?
faq.contactText: Contact us and we will help you

questions.whoCanUseAnswer: Our services are designed for veterinary clinics, pharmacies, farms, and licensed professionals in the field.
questions.wholesaleOnlyAnswer: Yes, we carry out wholesale sales exclusively for legal entities and individual entrepreneurs.
questions.certifiedAnswer: Yes, all our veterinary medicines are certified and comply with current legislative and international requirements.
questions.productRange: What kind of products are included in your range
questions.productRangeAnswer: Our range includes veterinary medicines, vaccines, vitamins and supplements, as well as disinfectants, detergents and cleaning products.
questions.placeOrder: How can I place an order
questions.placeOrderAnswer: You can place an order by contacting our sales department by phone, email, or through the website.
questions.deliveryAnswer: Yes, we provide delivery under pre-agreed terms and conditions.
questions.consultationAnswer: Yes, our specialists provide advice on product selection and application.
questions.becomePartner: How can I become your partner
questions.becomePartnerAnswer: You can contact us to become a partner.
questions.documents: Do you provide accompanying documents for each product
questions.documentsAnswer: Yes, each supplied product is accompanied by the necessary documents.
questions.storage: How are the storage conditions for medicines ensured
questions.storageAnswer: The storage process is carried out in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions and current standards, ensuring appropriate temperature and hygienic conditions.
questions.vaccineStorage: Are vaccines stored under refrigerated conditions
questions.vaccineStorageAnswer: Yes, vaccines are maintained under complete cold storage control throughout the entire supply chain.
questions.deliveryTimeAnswer: Delivery times are determined after order confirmation, depending on the order volume and delivery location.
questions.minOrder: What is the minimum order quantity
questions.minOrderAnswer: The minimum order quantity is set individually and depends on the product type and terms of cooperation.
questions.discounts: Are there discounts for bulk purchases
questions.discountsAnswer: Yes, special pricing conditions and discount policies apply for large orders.
questions.regions: Do you work in the regions
questions.regionsAnswer: Yes, we deliver both in the capital and in the regions of the Republic of Armenia.
questions.startCoopDocs: What documents are needed to start a partnership
questions.startCoopDocsAnswer: To start a collaboration, the legal details of the organization are required.
questions.customOrder: Is it possible to make a custom order or special import
questions.customOrderAnswer: Yes, for some products it is possible to arrange an individual order or special import with a prepayment.
questions.contactSpecialist: How can I contact the responsible specialist
questions.contactSpecialistAnswer: You can contact our sales department by phone, email, or through the website contact form.
